Bite.name: Bite
Bite.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 ([[/r 2d6 + 4]]) piercing damage.

Spider Climb.name: Spider Climb
Spider Climb.description: The moth can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
